class.name: custom_effort_controllers/JointPositionController
class.description: The JointPositionController tracks position commands. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: custom_effort_controllers/JointVelocityController
class.description: The JointVelocityController tracks velocity commands. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: custom_effort_controllers/JointEffortController
class.description: The JointEffortController tracks effort commands. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: custom_effort_controllers/JointGroupEffortController
class.description: The JointGroupEffortController tracks effort commands for a set of joints. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: custom_effort_controllers/JointPositionTorqueController
class.description: The JointPositionTorqueController tracks position commands(feedback) and effort commands(feedforward). It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: custom_effort_controllers/JointGroupPositionEffortController
class.description: The JointGroupPositionEffortController tracks position commands(feedback) and effort commands(feedforward) for multiple joints. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.
